title: Program Catalog Industrial Engineering
program_name: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering
slu_vision_mission: Saint Louis University envisions itself as an excellent missionary and transformative educational institution, developing globally competitive, locally responsive, and empowered individuals who are competent, creative, socially involved, and imbued with the Christian spirit.
school_vision_mission: The School of Engineering and Architecture aims to be an exemplary institution in engineering and architecture, committed to elevating instruction, research, and community extension, and shaping the socio-technical environment through Christian values.
educational_objectives: Demonstrate technical competence in solving problems and designing systems.
Practice with honesty, service, and moral responsibility guided by Christian values.
Pursue advanced studies, research and development, or innovation in science and technology.
Actively contribute to solving technical, social, and business challenges.
learning_outcomes: Apply knowledge of math, science, and engineering fundamentals.
Conduct research-based investigations and analyze data to draw valid conclusions.
Design systems or processes addressing health, safety, cultural, and environmental factors.
Function effectively in multidisciplinary and diverse teams.
Formulate conclusions through analysis and literature review.
Apply ethical principles and fulfill professional responsibilities.
Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical audiences.
Evaluate sustainability and societal impact of engineering solutions.
Engage in lifelong learning and adapt to technological changes.
Assess safety, health, legal, and cultural aspects of engineering practice.
Use modern tools, IT, and modeling effectively with awareness of limitations.
Apply engineering management principles and sound decision-making skills.
Improve integrated systems involving people, materials, information, equipment, and energy.
Practice Christian values in their professional life.

admission_policies.freshmen: Must pass Saint Louis University College Entrance Examination.
admission_policies.transferees: Must pass Qualifying Examination, Personality Test, and Interview.
admission_policies.graduate_students: Must hold relevant undergraduate or graduate degrees.
foreign_students: Must apply 6 months before term start.
Must pass English Proficiency Test and entrance examinations.
Must be in Baguio 4 weeks before classes begin.
Must secure a valid Student Visa.

tuition_and_fees.note: Subject to change without prior notice

department_head.name: Engr. Maria Corazon D. Ocampo, MSME
department_head.title: BSIE Department Head

secretary.name: Mr. Alexander J. Pascua
secretary.title: School of Engineering and Architecture Head Secretary

evaluator.name: Mr. Jojo C. Tianan
evaluator.title: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering Evaluator
